summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3820 for the improvement of 5th avenue and 5th Avenue South, from Madison Street to Dearborn Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving the unpaved portions thereof, under Ordinance No. 46955, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
